content: संचारः {@--1@} Going, movement, travelling or roaming through; स पुनः पार्थसंचारं संचरत्यवनीपतिः <ls>K. P. 10</ls>; सुलभपुरुषसंचारेऽस्मिन्प्रदेशे <ls>Mk. 7</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 15.</ls> {@--2@} Passing through, passage, transit. {@--3@} A course, way, road, <ab>pass.</ab> {@--4@} A difficult progress or journey. {@--5@} Difficulty, distress. {@--6@} Inciting. {@--7@} Leading, guiding. {@--8@} Transmission, contagion. {@--9@} A gem said to be found in the hood of serpents. {@--10@} The entrance of the sun into a new sign.
